description:
After living an ordinary life as a graduate student, Pia suddenly finds herself reincarnated as a mob villainess in an otome game. The event awaiting her at the game’s climax is the “Breakup Scene” during the graduation party— where her engagement is annulled and she’s exiled from the country. That is Pia’s destined fate!
Having completely lost her confidence, the timid Pia tries to end her engagement with Rufus, her capable fiancé. However, her words wound Rufus’s pride instead! “If you’re serious about breaking our engagement, shall we make a bet?”
Thus begins a series of unpredictable events as Pia is swept along by Rufus’s challenge! A timid villainess × strongest fiancé— What will be the outcome of this “fateful bet”…?

titles.title: Yowaki Max Reijou na no ni, Ratsuwan Kon`yakusha-sama no Kake ni Notte Shimatta
弱気MAX令嬢なのに, 辣腕婚約者様の賭けに乗ってしまった
